title: BRIEF-Kazia Therapeutics Announces Completion Of Placement Of 10 Mln New Fully Paid Ordinary Shares
text:
BRIEF-Kazia Therapeutics Announces Completion Of Placement Of 10 Mln New Fully Paid Ordinary Shares

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 13:07)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Kazia Therapeutics Announces Completion Of Placement Of 10 Mln New Fully Paid Ordinary Shares Oct 28 (Reuters) - Kazia Therapeutics Ltd : * KAZIA THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES COMPLETION OF PLACEMENT OF 10 MILLION NEW FULLY PAID ORDINARY SHARES IN CO AT A PRICE OF A$0.40 PER NEW SHARE
